name: test_3
description: In this test you are required to make nodejs env to work. - Download Nodejs from [nodejs](https://nodejs.org/en/) - Go to your terminal/command prompt - Change the current working directory to [`server.js`](https://github.com/elbertwidjaja/SALT_2022/blob/main/test_3/server.js)'s file path - Run the following command  ``` npm init -y npm start ``` - Go to your browser and type http://localhost:3000 - Happy debugging
